name: Ghost Name Generator
description: Unleash your inner phantom with our Ghost Name Generator! Find the perfect spooky alias for your spectral adventures. Whether you're haunting a castle, writing a ghost story, or just feeling a little...transparent, we've got you covered.
introduction: Feeling a little… *unseen*? Need a name that whispers from beyond the grave? Our Ghost Name Generator is here to help you conjure the perfect moniker. From chillingly classic to spookily unique, discover a name that will send shivers down spines and make you the talk (or the *silent drift*) of the spectral realm.
howToUse: Simply click the 'Generate' button and *poof!* A ghostly name appears before your very eyes.
Don't like what you see? No problem! Click again for a fresh, bone-chilling suggestion.
Mix and match prefixes and suffixes for a truly personalized haunting experience. Get creative!
Share your spooky new name with friends and family (if they dare).
Use your new name in games, stories, or even as a fun online alias. The possibilities are as endless as the afterlife!

faqs.question: How does the Ghost Name Generator work?
faqs.answer: It's all smoke and mirrors... or rather, algorithms and carefully curated lists of ghostly prefixes and suffixes! We combine them in spooky ways to create unique and memorable names.

faqs.question: Can I use the generated names for commercial purposes?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Once the name is generated, it's yours to use as you please. Haunt away!

faqs.question: Are the names copyrighted?
faqs.answer: Nope! The generated names are completely original and free for you to use. No need to worry about spectral lawyers.

faqs.question: Can I suggest new prefixes or suffixes?
faqs.answer: We're always open to suggestions! Send us your spookiest ideas, and we might just add them to the generator.

faqs.question: What if I don't like any of the generated names?
faqs.answer: Keep clicking! With countless combinations, you're bound to find a name that tickles your spectral fancy. Or, you know, just feels right for your haunting style.

faqs.question: Is this generator actually haunted?
faqs.answer: We can neither confirm nor deny the presence of paranormal activity within the code. Use at your own risk... and keep the lights on!
